hiragana.title: Intro to Hiragana
hiragana.content: Hiragana is the most fundamental alphabet that you need to know as a Japanese learner. Every native Japanese word can be written in hiragana and it is used to read Kanji!

hiragana.title: Vowels
hiragana.content: Just like in English, vowels can be found all over Japanese, therefore we will start with them!

hiragana.title: A, E, U, I and O
hiragana.content: Aswell as with English the vowels are the same! we have (a, e, i, o and u) which in japanese are (あ、え、い、お、う)
